headers.alertMsg: Here is the overview of your invoices Send an invoice to your customers quickly and easily ðŸ™Œ Get an overview of the status of your invoices.

labels.useCredit: Use a credit on this invoice

descriptions.reference: Write a reference if the customer requires this. Leave the field blank otherwise.
descriptions.includeVat: VAT is usually always included unless you provide educational services or you are invoicing companies outside of DK in the EU.
descriptions.vacationPayment: Add if you want to withhold 12.5%, to add to your holiday account.
descriptions.useCredit: You currently have $t(descriptions.credit, {"count": {{credits}} }) available on your account. You can use a credit to receive {{reward}} off of your invoice fee. To use this credit, check the box below.
descriptions.earlyPayment: Click here if you want your money in your account within 24 hours - regardless of how long your customer's payment deadline is. It costs {{amount}}%, and you can read more about the <referenceLink>conditions here.</referenceLink>

info.paymentDueDays: Enter how many days your customer has to pay. If you are in doubt, 8 to 11 days is a good standard.
info.startDate: Used only internally and will not be shown to your customer.
info.endDate: Used only internally and will not be shown to your customer.
info.jobType: Used only internally and will not be shown to your customer.
info.hoursWorked: Used only internally and will not be shown to your customer.
info.submit:
When you submit your invoice, it is first approved by the Factofly team before it is delivered to your customer. 

You can follow the status of your invoice continuously. It will change from "Sent" to "Sent to Company" when we have shipped to your customer.

validation.termsAccepted: You must accept the terms and conditions

messages.createAs: You are creating this invoice as {{- displayName}}
messages.pleaseSelectInvoice: Please select an invoice from the left hand side.
messages.discountApplied: A credit has been applied to this invoice giving a discount of {{discount}}

errors.copy: There was an error copying the original invoice.

terms: I confirm when creating the invoice, the regular <termsLink>terms and conditions</termsLink>, and that the information entered is correct and that the invoice can then only be invoiced and paid with releasing effect to Factofly.
